p: Three.js voxel editor for Roblox Level Builder

f.main.ts: Entry point: initializes Core, Player, Terrain, Control, UI, Audio
f.constants.ts: Shared constants: bounds, colors, block limits (10,000 max)
f.control/editMode.ts: EditMode enum (Single, Line, Floor, Wall) with labels and keyboard shortcuts
f.utils/thumbnail.ts: Thumbnail capture utility (WebGL canvas to base64 PNG)
f.ui/tools/index.ts: ToolsHotbar component for editing mode selection (Cmd+1-4 shortcuts)

d.control/: Input handling, block placement/removal, edit mode state
d.ui/: HUD, menus, export button, level selection, tools hotbar
d.utils/: DOM helpers, mobile detection, thumbnail capture
